page.title: 04English Language School.
page.content: At the moment the School has four nationalities. Four{Spanish,}eight{ {Italians,}three{Germans}and seven{ {French.}There were nineteen actually boarding,the rest live with English families.There are four working hours with breaks in between,but the students do not work on Saturdays or Sundays.The{activities}include football, tennis, horseriding, volleyball, films and badminton. The Language School is open from{Easter}to {September,}and the age ranges from seven to fourteen.In the School they have eight rooms and the younger pupils go to bed at 8.45 p.m.the remainder at 9.45 p.m.The{classes}are divided into groups of eight to a class according to their ability to speak English.
